Class Message

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.models.Message
public class Message extends Object
Represents a message between customer and owner. Used for customer support and communication.

    • Message

      public Message(int senderId, int receiverId, String subject, String content)
      Constructor with basic message info.
      Parameters:
      senderId - Sender's user ID
      receiverId - Receiver's user ID
      subject - Message subject
      content - Message content
